title: Shortage in the foreign exchange market

content.question:
Use the graph to answer the question.

If one Indian rupee is exchanged for three Japanese yen in the foreign exchange market, which of the following describes the foreign exchange market for Indian rupees?

choices.label: There is a surplus of 40 yen.
There is a surplus of 20 rupees.
There is a shortage of 20 yen.
There is a shortage of 40 rupees.
The foreign exchange market is in equilibrium.

content.answer: There is a shortage of 40 rupees.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
